title: Benny Carter with Ben Webster and Barney Bigard - 1962 - BBB and
description:
Benny Carter with Ben Webster and Barney Bigard - 1962 - BBB and Co

One of Benny Carter's last jazz recordings before he became totally immersed in writing for the studios, this set matches his alto and trumpet with tenor great Ben Webster, clarinetist Barney Bigard and trumpeter Shorty Sherock on a pair of lengthy blues and Carter's "Lula" and "When Lights Are Low." All of the swing all-stars are in fine form, making one wish that they were not being so neglected by critics and fans alike during this era; Webster soon left the U.S. permanently for Europe. Although not essential, this set is fun. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01 - Opening Blues
02 - Lula
03 - When Lights Are Low
04 - You Can't Tell The Difference When The Sun Goes Down Blues
